text: Avvāṟē nakaraṅkaḷiṉ tāykkum, (makkāvukkum ataṉaic cuṟṟiyuḷḷavaṟṟukkum accamūṭṭi eccarippataṟkākavum, evvita cantēkamumiṉṟi (yāvarum) oṉṟu cērkkappaṭum nāḷaippaṟṟi accamūṭṭi eccarippataṟkākavum, arapi poḻiyilāṉa inta kur'āṉai nām umakku vahī'aṟivikkiṟōm; oru kūṭṭam cuvarkkattilum oru kūṭṭam narakilum irukkum
